title: Pasadena Humane Society
description: Dedicated to the humane treatment of animals in the Pasadena area.

title: Union Station Homeless Services
description: Helping individuals and families rebuild their lives and end homelessness in the Pasadena area.

title: Los Angeles Regional Food Bank
description: Fighting hunger by providing food to people in need.

title: Heal the Bay
description: Dedicated to making Southern California coastal waters and watersheds, including Santa Monica Bay, safe, healthy, and clean.

title: TreePeople
description: Inspiring the people of Los Angeles to take personal responsibility for the urban forest.

title: The Midnight Mission
description: Offering paths to self-sufficiency to men, women and children who have lost everything.

title: Clare Foundation
description: Providing compassionate treatment and recovery services for alcoholism and substance abuse to individuals, families, and the community.

title: Girls on the Run Los Angeles
description: Inspiring girls to be joyful, healthy and confident using a fun, experience-based curriculum which creatively integrates running.

title: Big Brothers Big Sisters of Greater Los Angeles
description: Providing children facing adversity with strong and enduring, professionally supported one-to-one relationships that change their lives for the better.
